name: GamerCon
description:
My first attempt at creating a very basic platformer game using GODT free game engine, following an online tutorial from BornCG.

His YouTube series and more can be found here BornCG YouTube Tutorials

Just updated to version 0.0.2.

Now has fireball and climbing walls, added more level and enemies. More progress to come.

You can also find Downloads for Windows 32 bit and 64 bit, and for Linux systems to try out. Just unzip with any compression program or get 7zip for free here 7-ZIP

Have fun!

I will update it as I make progress on it in the future.
